General.Name: National Medical Care Company
General.Description: National Medical Care Company owns, equips, operates, manages, and maintains healthcare facilities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates Riyadh care hospital with a capacity of 325 beds; National care hospital with a capacity of 459 beds; and family health care center, as well as distributes pharmaceutical and medical products. It also provides home healthcare services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Imam Ahmad Ibn hanbal Street, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11457
